description: Try our easy to follow Roast Whole Onions recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Roast,Low salt,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Roast Whole Onions Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Trim 1cm from base and tops of onions. Peel if desired. Place onions in a roasting pan so they fit snugly together. Drizzle with oil and balsamic vinegar. Season with salt and pepper and scatter with rosemary leaves.
Cover with foil and roast for 40–50 minutes or until tender. Uncover, drizzle with maple syrup and dot with butter. Cook, uncovered, for 20 minutes or until golden.
